amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 116-61 to require GAO to study the effect of the administration's cuts to ACA outreach and the Navigator Program on health insurance enrollment and the cost of coverage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Morelle amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Morelle.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Morelle amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
